website_summaries.verdict: Contains plenty of protein, which helps the large breed dog feel fuller and avoid weight gain.
pros: Includes an omega-3 fatty acids and glucosamine to help large dogs maintain joint health
Formula designed to allow the dog to easily absorb all of the nutrients
Has a 26% protein count, which means the dog feels full

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Buy this from amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great food for you babies; however I have repeatedly received out of date or expired and discolored food. The out of date bags have a lighter color and just dont look right. My dogs are my family and no different than me going to store and seeing to packages of meat one out dated and looks bad and one that is quality and fresh, I wouldn't buy the outdated discolored one and eat it, and I wont feed my dogs the same. The brand is good healthy and high quality when it is sold before expiration date; however Amazon does not take that into consideration when shipping your order.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: High quality dog food at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Due to recent FDA reports about grain free dog foods, we decided to wean our Dane onto another food since heart disease is even more common in the giant breeds. I always thought Purina was a *junk dog food*, but this is very high quality, and my dog loves it! The kibble is larger than what she's used to and she all but swallows it whole, and the smell is pretty undesirable to me, but I'm grateful this is available on Amazon for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cox

customer_reviews.title: Our BIG DOGS love this food.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Golden Retriever & a Golden Doodle. The retriever has had skin problems all his life; which have reflected in his coat. Now his COAT (at age 12) is BEAUTIFUL. The hair on his tail is about 6 inches long and I have to trim his feathers and belly. The doodle, although larger and with an entirely different coat is 1 1/2 and he loves this product. We had fed a grain free product to the retriever until information came out about heart disease in retrievers caused by grain free food. Everywhere you look to reliable ratings, this food scores very high. Our boys love it and are healthy; we can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great food choice!
customer_reviews.text: My saint bernard was such a picky eater when I had him on hills science diet then someone at petsmart recommended this brand. He loves this food!! Because the kibble is so much larger he no longer gets choked when eating. I have noticed his coat isn't quite as soft as before but that was an easy trade considering it helped his appetite and allergies. I reccomend this food. I will say though that the packaging is ALWAYS destroyed when it is delivered. I haven't had an issue with the actual bag being damaged but the first time that happens I'll definitely be switching to my local pet store or Chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Hattiel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how good this is
customer_reviews.text: But my Great Dane farts like a freight train now. He's blown out two windows, and one of my neighbors has moved.
customer_reviews.author: MacTownFun

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended - Dog LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a pet that was eating Kal Kan (not a quality dog food) and we switched him to Blue Buffalo assuming it was "good". He began having diarrhea and drinking TONS of water. His first vet check up after we got home the vet told us that many dogs have diarrhea on Blue Buffalo and suggested we do a gradual transition to Purina Pro Plan. Best thing we could have done. Pup is doing great - no more stomach issues and drinks a normal amount of water now. He's energetic and happy and can hardly wait to eat! Very pleased with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: You will find out just how good a dog food is by changing over to a cheaper brand. I bought a 50lb bag of Kibbles and Bits and like everything else, he loved it. But he's a Lab that loves any type of food at any time of the day. He was gaining weight and didn't seem as active. He got worms too. So I got rid of the worms and rid of K&B. He's now back on Pro Plan where he will stay. One quick way to find out if your dog is sick is in his eating habits. If my Lab even hesitates to eat, I know there is something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Purina Pro Plan Large Breed Adult
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food I have found for our Black Mouth Cur. He is very active and Purina Pro Plan has all the right ingredients to keep him going. I like that there are no fillers, just meat protein. It satisfies him but keeps him slim with muscle and no fat.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Long

customer_reviews.title: Best dog food!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE this food. It’s perfect for someone who wants to and is able to spend some extra money to get a higher quality food, but isn’t ridiculously expensive like some other brands. We were recommended this food by my dad who feeds it to his large 11 year old black lab. She is super healthy and has eaten this food all her life. Our dogs coats are so shiny, they are so active and happy on this food. Will never feed them anything else! Adding a photo of the dogs mid-food coma because they’re cute.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B

customer_reviews.title: Our pups enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Our pets seem to enjoy their meals. I do add a pup safe gravy, only because my girls are spoiled rotten. Joint health and mobility is important for our girls, one being a German Shepard and the other a English Bulldog Pit mix rescue. Satisfied with the ingredients, product quality is good, and leaves the dogs happy and full between their meals. We tend to feed a cup per pup at breakfast and a cup each for dinner As recommended by our vet. Amazons auto ship feature also saves the embarrassment of not realizing that you’ve ran out of dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Better for dog with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: After finding out our boxer is allergic to basically everything we realized our expensive dog food was making our poor pup sick. I had to go on an extensive hunt for a dog food without any of his allergens. This is one of 2 options I found. For the first time in years, he is happily gobbling up his food! He has put on a few pounds (which he needed) and his coat looks great. It has not really cured his constant licking habit (still working on that) BUT his stomach has been SO much better! Less gas and less poop (huge win for us and him!). Also this is a much better value- added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: WinWigWon

customer_reviews.title: Great food but big kibbles!
customer_reviews.text: This food was great except for the fact that the kibble is huge and my dog has bad teeth (yes he gets dentals and cleanings and all that jazz, just in his genetics). I switched to the purina pro plan sensitive skin and stomach (small kibble) and he LOVES it! Nothing wrong with the ingredients in this food, just wish there was an option for smaller kibble. You can try soaking it in water if your dog has this issue, but my dog likes to graze and leave a little snack for later so it didn’t work for us. Definitely love purina pro plan products!
customer_reviews.author: Lalala

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs one is a poodle mix one is ...
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs one is a poodle mix one is a pitbull mix they have skin allergies and they have been on the dry cleaner Pro Plan sensitive skin and stomach for 5 years no issues whatsoever but my vet said they're getting older so they need some moisture in their diet to help with their coat and their kidneys so I've been buying this which is the same as the dry but it's wet don't hesitate to buy it'll take it off your dogs to get used to the Pate feeling on their time but once they do they eat it right up. I give them one can each every other day basically As a treat
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Oursler

customer_reviews.title: Guinevere loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90 lb. Catahoula that’s not very picky, but really gets excited for the higher quality foods. Now every time she comes back in the house, she heads to her food bowl and stares at me. Good quality poops and keeps her energy up.
customer_reviews.author: Scottisretired

customer_reviews.title: cans batched in
customer_reviews.text: On all the shipments all the cans have been batched in some to the point that they were cracked and had to be thrown away. I thought it may be the one shipment but all of them are the same to the point that my wife asked me to stop the shipments. Yes I know I can return them but then I have to go out and buy more to feed the dog while I process the return and get more cans.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Dogs seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Food is great. Dogs love it. Packaging wasn't too great. Six of the 12 cans were dented. One was dented so badly the top was open and there was dog food EVERYWHERE. Gross but able to be cleaned up. I'd have sent it back if we weren't in such weird times where people are hoarding everything, including dog food. My dogs like the food though so I'll still give it five stars. It's not manufacturer that packed it poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: good and bad?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a few times from Amazon as the price is hard to beat but i did notice he does well on the food one month then the next bag he gets sick. I tried other dog food to see if that would do the trick but he wont eat it and i end up coming back to this food which he eats. Not sure if i got a bad bag but Amazon support was great to work with me when i did get a bad bag for this food A++
customer_reviews.author: DOOGIE

customer_reviews.title: Ivey Approved
customer_reviews.text: I did not rate the flavor because I am not a dog. I do know my dog enjoys the taste & the food on the label actually looks like the food inside. The images shown showcase how the product arrives, valid expiration date, food when can opened & food mixed ready to spoon out.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haapapuro

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the chicken flavor
customer_reviews.text: my dog likes the chicken flavor more than the salmon. he got so excited when he was a puppy over his chicken food. i switched to salmon thinking he was allergic to chicken. he never got excited over that lol I don't blame him. when I went to the adult chicken flavor, he got excited for mealtime again. I am hoping this is brand has quality ingredients as I feel it does, because he is my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confused on quality but great price
customer_reviews.text: This brand is such a hit or a miss, it’s disappointing store bought or on Amazon. I switched to amazon due to my store bought (same brand) had maggots that turned into flies by the time I realized it. One order on here was great and the other was the same issue I described above. Guess I might be done ordering this brand for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality food for your dog. I switched from Blue Buffalo because my dog kept having runny stools and was just so skinny. We switched him to this stuff and he grew a beautiful coat, put on a healthy weight, has lean muscle, and more energy. We feed according to the bag and that works well for us. I definitely recommend this food!
customer_reviews.author: Ramage

customer_reviews.title: Maggots?
customer_reviews.text: I store my dogs food in an airtight container that is cleaned every time it’s filled. This was no different. Yet I ended up finding maggots in it one morning. I was terrified and disgusted. Amazon did refund me. And I threw the food out. There was a number and a lot number on the bag. But I just wanted it out of my house. So I didn’t call Purina
customer_reviews.author: CB-mojo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the dog food. I have a golden retriever and an Australian Shepard. Both are about 55LBS so we always get the big bag. For the price point and the quantity I have been very pleased. We have never had any issues with their coat or skin or allergies that we have with other foods. I would absolutely recommend trying this stuff out!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick&SamanthaW.

customer_reviews.title: I mix two Purina products
customer_reviews.text: My young active Dalmatian needs low purine, high protein food. Purina Pro focus together with Purina Pro One gives her what she needs for healthy skin and mental nourishment. Her coat is like silk and she can ficus on her required behaviors. That makes us both happy.
customer_reviews.author: KAAREN NELSEN

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best I found for my Great Danes
customer_reviews.text: With all of the "controversy" surrounding dog food lately, I have to say I am nothing but happy with the Purina Pro Plan Giant Breed Formula. My 2 Danes love it and I feel comfortable with the ingredients and the company making it. My dogs are healthy and active. They have shiny coats and no issues with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: TS2936

customer_reviews.title: For High Brain and High activity Dogs GREAT FOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Shepherd, she is just over a year old! Loves Purina’s pro dog food, we used the puppy food for her as well! She’s a high energy, busy brain dog, and this food fills her up and keeps her going. Not overly expensive and has great ingredients and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia C.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and it's a good value for the money it includes nutrients important to large breed dogs and it's one of the only foods that dont give them gi upset. One of my dogs started having seizures on another brand and since being on this not one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food for golden retrievers
customer_reviews.text: Great food for golden retrievers! I was using Costco stuff after raising a bullmastiff on it. When I got my Golden it wasn't doing to job. He pooped to often, coat was just ok... Etc. I started him on this food (puppy formula first) after reading online reviews and was really amazed. Within a week his coat got glossy and his eyes brightened. I was really shocked, I never thought food would be that much of a difference. He pooped half as much and they were firm. He has been on it since with zero skin or health issues. (3 years now)
customer_reviews.author: HankSteel

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: this is not the top of the line food but not bottom either. But my dog has a sensitive stomach and has always done well with this so I’m happy with this. He also gets nutrition from other sources but this is his main one. Also in my area this size bag is really hard to find in local pet stores Or if they have this variety it’s not the same size so we end up spending much more more per ounce. This really helps
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Short

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this product. I have used this same food (but purchased at pet store) for months and had zero issues. My 1 yo lab became sick and had diarrhea for days and some vomiting after ingesting the food from this bag/order. My dog eats anything and everything and completely stopped eating this food. Packaging and kibble looks identical to store-bought product but ingredients must be subpar or formulated differently.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purina Pro dog food for large breeds
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding this to my large (100 lb) labs for last 10 plus years, every once and a while i look at something else and i always come back to purina pro due to the consitancy of the food, the pricing, and the quality. Plus my dogs are happy and healty on it. Use what the pros use. Purina PRO
customer_reviews.author: Chris WilcoxTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Purina Pro Plan is very good dog food
customer_reviews.text: The vet suggested we give our 2 year old lab a dog food without chicken as the number one ingredient as a way of preventing her from itching. The vet said sometimes the addition of chicken can cause an allergy. We currently mix three kinds of Purina Pro Plan together and the dog is happy and so are we. We will probably go back to one kind but it will only be Purina Pro Plan brand. GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Gremma

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened here. My dog has eaten ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened here. My dog has eaten this brand and flavor for the last 1.5 years. This is the first purchase I made from Amazon of dog food. My dog immediately reacted to this food by getting picky and vomited after she ate some. Amazon immediately refunded me for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ax8man

customer_reviews.title: My dogs woof it down!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, competitive price vs online pet stores, and delivered to my door (Sorry Mr. Postman). The large breed formula is great for Golden Retrievers and Mastiffs. My dogs love the taste and woof it down, with no digestive issues. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bassmatt68

customer_reviews.title: Foreign Material in Food
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this same dog food for the better part of three years. After my wife dumped the most recent bag of food into the dog food storage container, she noticed that it was full of foreign material that looks like either threads of material or some sort of paper like product. We had to throw the entire container of food out. Someone at Purina needs to take a hard look at the quality control associated with this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended and dog approved
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended we switch from another brand due to the lack of research behind the other brand. So far so good. My dogs are happy with the food. We no longer have to worry whether they will eat or not. The food is gone from their bowls within seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Arant

customer_reviews.title: Great Puppy Food at a Good Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I have a lab that we got when she was 8 weeks. She was eating this at the breeder so we decided to keep up with it. It hadn’t let us down. The puppy loves it and she is a healthy, energetic 8 months. Sometimes she has way too much energy but I don’t think that’s the food.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas V. Tutolo

customer_reviews.title: Roll of the dice
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying online for about half a year now. The last bag we got didn’t smell right, my lab (who needs a massive rock in his food to slow him down to eat) refused to eat this food. I wasn’t sure if it was because of the heat coming in or what it was so I ended up going and buying a bag locally to see a side by side comparison. The online food smelt sour - definitely something off with it. My lab immediately ate the locally bought store food without hesitation. Until now we have had no problems, but it’s just not worth the risk imo and tossing a whole bag of food.
customer_reviews.author: Nira

customer_reviews.title: Review based on shipping
customer_reviews.text: lets me honest, its a great dog food and my dogs love it. I purchase monthly from Amazon as I have a hard time finding it local. For the last two shipments the box the dog food comes in is coming apart where it was sealed with amazon tape. Otherwise the dog food gets a 5 Star
customer_reviews.author: CruiseLandandSea

customer_reviews.title: Quality food my dog loves
customer_reviews.text: Cooper just loves this food! He likes to eat it mixed in with his regular food or by itself. The cans came well packaged without dents. They have easy open lids and seem like a decent amount of food. The only negative is that it seems expensive - but it is cheaper than buying it in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Pro Plan for my 9 month old GSD puppy. I used it at the breeders recommendation and it is the only food he gets other than some peas, carrots and green beans. Again at the breeders recommendation, at 9 months I switched him from large breed puppy to large breed adult. The result is he is a big strong happy boy (at 102 lbs at 9 months) his coat is smooth and shiny, stools are firm, breath is good and teeth clean. I will continue to use only Pro Plan as long as he remains healthy.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Ants
customer_reviews.text: We have previously been very happy with our monthly order of Purine ProPlan through the subscribe and save feature; however, the past two shipments have arrived with ants in the shipment. Not just in the box the bag arrives in- but in the bag itself. And of course, this stuff isn’t cheap- so we dig through the bag to salvage what we can. But no longer, we will be taking our business somewhere else. We absolutely love this dog food, we are just extremely disappointed in the condition that it arrives. Not sure who that falls on but we will be buying through another company and hopefully get the same great value but with better results.
customer_reviews.author: Savana

customer_reviews.title: THE DOGS LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA with HEALTHY ingredients. We asked our Vet Tech. and she recommended the Purina Brand. As far as the flavor goes, I haven't tasted it (yet) but the Huskie and the Terrier-Mix like it A LOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Your'e UPS guy is gonna love you!
customer_reviews.text: Quality food for the pup without breaking the bank. It's more costly than it should be, but the brand name brings it up. Great alternative to other high end foods, with nearly the same makeup. Great for active dogs like Labs. On a side note, if it ships with other products the courier will hate your guts. Hard to carry an oversize box with a small package and 34lbs of dog food moving inside. Needless to say the box looked like it may have been repacked numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Baker

customer_reviews.title: Our Bloodhound Likes It
customer_reviews.text: We've fed this food to our bloodhound for about 2 years. His eagerness to eat the food and good demeanor after consumption leads us to believe he enjoys this dog food. We'll continue to give this food to him, until we feel otherwise. Also, the price on Amazon is usually a few dollars better than what we can find at the local retail/pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: Huey

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE this food and I LOVE that it is great quality for a good price. It is also one of the brands that my vet recommends. It took us a long time to find a brand that not only was good quality but had great taste and I can tell how the dogs woof it down that it is good taste.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Purina Pro
customer_reviews.text: Love this huge bag of Purina Pro for my precious lab...my dog’s gobbles this twice daily...Maintains correct weight, good health and dog’s appetite!! Can’t be beat...
customer_reviews.author: C. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Expensive
customer_reviews.text: These cost more than we usually pay for dog food, but we thought our finicky dog would love it. Not so, but he is so hard to please I'm sure it's the dog and not the food.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very food picky dog did not like, so now idea how good it was.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog that is Very picky about food then you may want to skip this one. I have given it 2 stars for the value that bag gave. But my dog is really picky on food. So if they changed the way it smells he may have tried it. But this was not human bad smelling, just my dog. So if your dog is picky then you may want to skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MADE MY DOG SICK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever has been on this food, in January I had a new bag shipped from amazon..... my dog has had diarrhea horribly, I mean never has accidents in the house and its so bad that she can't even hold it for an hour, I have taken her to the vet twice and she was given and antibiotic and pro pectalin. Upon reading reviews I have discovered that several people have had the same problem with getting a bad bag of dog food. Please check your bag before feeding it to your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My 3 labs did well on this
customer_reviews.text: Same amount of food as previous product and better controlled my dogs weight. Amazon auto order didn’t give me the option to have delivered every 3 weeks, and I kept running out with 3 dogs and 4 week delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worms!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my service dog. When it arrived the packaging was destroyed. Within two weeks of opening the dog food was full of worms! My service dog is sick!! I am working with my Vetinarian to bring him back to healthy $$. I will not be purchasing any more dog food from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kores

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love you for it.
customer_reviews.text: My sweet girl was having stomach issues with other foods, and didn't appear to be putting on any weight. She is a full blooded German Shepherd. Anyway 3 days after starting this, no more stomach issues, and she was looking way healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Swain

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Brookie can be a finicky eater but now that she's getting a little long in the tooth, we wanted to get her on a food that was a bit healthier for her. But one that didn't break the bank (we're on one income). She loves this food and I love how Amazon delivers it by subscription so I don't have to worry about lugging trays of canned dog food in and out of my car. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs that seem to always be hungry!
customer_reviews.text: I have a weim that always seemed to be hungry and always begged for food. I did some research and came across this food and boy does it help my dog! Not only does it control his hungry but his overall health is improving as well! Worth every penny and never will I switch to a cheaper brand of dog food again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Switches our dogs from Blue Limited Ingredient after multiple vets cautioning us against Blue. Our lab and golden retriever have been on it for roughly 6 months and we are very happy with it. No stomach issues and coats are as pretty as they’ve always been. It’s also less expensive than what we were previously giving to them which is just a bonus for our wallet. Will continue to buy this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost savings & prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: So long to a national pet store chain....Amazon is the way to go for me for my pet food delivery from now on. Saving time and money ($7-$8 a bag) for dog food, and was delivered the day it was promised. While said pet store chain is within 2 miles of home, I do not agree with some of their recent public policy changes, and am choosing to spend and save money with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good food. I highly recommend it, my dong loves it, but, from one month to another, the price got very high, so, I unsubscribed it.
customer_reviews.author: Ydelsi S. Santana N

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog break out in hives
customer_reviews.text: My american bully is allergic to this food. He hets hives and the hair fell out around the spot he got the hives. Not recommended for american bully owners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Great product, pricey
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has been eating this for years (she is 8) and she is in great health. I like the inclusion of glucosamine for large breeds. However, the price is too high here compared to the store.
customer_reviews.author: WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have started throwing up consitently. Vet did a check up and they all need to get off this food. I don’t know if I got a bad bag or what, but I’m going back to The previous brand
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: RUST!! DENTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Multiple cans came dented and some had rust in them. Now I’m worried to feed my dog this because what if all the cans are bad? Also she does not like them or have an interest in eating the meat, only the rice and gravy
customer_reviews.author: Amy E McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: We got this type after usually getting the Focus type. This bag was unusually crumbly. Our dog threw up a couple times, after a week or so he started only eating half the food. We tried mixing in yoghurt to entice him to eat. After he threw up 2 more times, we are assuming this is bad food and we will be tossing out the rest and buying different food.
customer_reviews.author: Ed  M

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Great food for my dog. When she was less than a year old, I tried a protein-only/chicken based dry food--it was too rich for her system and she developed diarrhea. I couldn't get it to stop with rice, etc. Transitioned to this food based on reviews, and she's now stable. Can even give her a snack from the table once in a while without disrupting her system. Grateful that I found this. Cheaper than at PetSmart.
customer_reviews.author: StacieLynn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has been eating ProPlan for 3 years and he is very healthy and very good looking. Ninety (90) pounds of muscle with a beautiful coat of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Purina is  a good product
customer_reviews.text: But my dogs were not happy with the chunks. They prefer the mushy dog food added to their dry Purina. Price is only a few cents higher than a local store here where I live.
customer_reviews.author: Deane

customer_reviews.title: Expired food!
customer_reviews.text: The bag that I received in June expired in March. I would not knowingly buy expired food!
customer_reviews.author: Jackalope61

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog eats it! Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky lady pit bull, it's hard to find a dog food she will eat consistantly, which could be dangerous to a large breed dog. I don't have any problems getting her meals into her any more, she loves this food. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Different name

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients but wide price range
customer_reviews.text: We started purchasing this online when recommended by our veterinarian. The dogs really enjoy it but we could never find it in local stores. No intestinal issues, great fur coats, and love the ingredients. The wide price range is a tad annoying though
customer_reviews.author: AnnaRoseH

customer_reviews.title: Bernedoodle
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been fed Focus since birth. Nothing else! Great, healthy dog!
customer_reviews.author: Patty M.

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My dog like it but she still needs time to get used to this food. I mixed previous food with this one for my dog
customer_reviews.author: Angustu

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs, both very food motivated. We have ordered this food before and both have eaten it just fine. They are typically very food motivated, but after we opened the most recent bag and have put it in their bowls, they won't go near it. We have even cut it with other food we know they like and neither of them will go for it. I think something is seriously wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gentle Giants
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 great danes love it! We have a 2-year old and a 12-year old and they both love it. Our senior dane was having terrible pain with arthritis but the Purina Pro Plan for giant dogs has the needed supplements to help him. He is able to get up and down and walk so much better. We have tried other much more expensive brands but always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: garrettdanes

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, dog Parents happy
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs seem to absolutely love this food. No allergies or any stomach discomfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie G

customer_reviews.title: Its great dog food. Stop wasting money on expensive well marketed dog foods
customer_reviews.text: Its dog food. Not the best not the worst. I use other supplements to add proper balance of vitamins and protein to my dogs diet. People love to buy into marketing of the "All natural" dog food crap. Sometimes the more inclusive foods are required but for my 4 year old black lab this stuff is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog has sensitivity issues and this has been recommended by a few vets
customer_reviews.text: Solid recipe from a brand and company we have grown to trust. Our Dog has sensitivity issues and this has been recommended by a few vets. Our Dog loves the flavor and hasn't had any issues!
customer_reviews.author: MJ.Sell

customer_reviews.title: With an English Mastiff that's not fun to pick up
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dog the dry proplan so I thought I would get this to stick with the same brand as to avoid and upset tummy. This food gives him diarrhea. I was only giving him half a can mixed with the dry a few times a week and every time he ate it is gave him diarrhea. With an English Mastiff that's not fun to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is my picker eater German shepherds favorite food.He loves to see the Amazon box on the porch!
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Moist dog foood
customer_reviews.text: They really like this pro plan alot seems to feel my girls more.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle prebish

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, strong, very lean puppy! Loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old German Shepherd/Rottweiler puppy is very healthy. I give her this Purina wet canned food along with Blue Buffalo chicken, grain free high protein dry food. (That one is more expensive than other dry foods but very healthy I think, and worth it) She is extremely lean and full of energy. She has never been sick or had any fur/skin conditions. She loves it too. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heavenly Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Living in a small town this particular dog food is hard to come by, and it’s more expensive. This dog food is all my dog eats without upsetting his stomach. I love the health benefits this food provides and the price. I always get the approval of my dog and his vet. Now all I have to do is order this and it’s here in 2 days thanks to prime!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob McCullough

customer_reviews.title: My picky eaters love this food.
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended I feed this to my two Goldens. I used to feed my dogs more expensive, holistic dog food but I asked my vet for his opinion on what he thought the best dog food is when the ingredient quality of the holistic food decreased and the price dramatically increased. My dogs are picky eaters, and one has a sensitive stomach. They love the food and transitioned with no stomach or intestinal problems.
customer_reviews.author: mrroach

customer_reviews.title: Dog Enjoys This Food
customer_reviews.text: This food is for a Lab-Chow mix dog weighting 92 pounds. He is 4 years old slim and trim and has food available all day. Usually eats 1 or 2 scoops per day.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Worms
customer_reviews.text: We use this dog food consistently and it's great for our dog nutritionally. However, this review is more regarding bag storage. We get a subscribe and save every other month and haven't had any issues - however, this most recent bag had tons of worms in it, so we had to throw the whole bag away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it is very affordable. My last order was received within 2 days which was great but 3 cans in the case were extremely damaged and are unable to be opened. The box it came in had bubble wrap and it was all in good shape so I'm assuming the case was dropped before it was shipped and that's why 3 of the cans are unusable. Besides that,my dog loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: tommy t.

customer_reviews.title: The giant breed formula is perfect for maintaining the health of our St
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves it and he is so healthy and gorgeous. This is the food fed by his breeder (the giant breed puppy formula) and we continued it when we brought him home. The giant breed formula is perfect for maintaining the health of our St. Bernard. The subscribe and save services are tremendous for bringing the huge bags to our doorstep. It costs the same or less to have it delivered monthly than it does to buy it at the discount pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Persnickety Person

customer_reviews.title: ProPlan Large Breed
customer_reviews.text: Dog has no issues with ProPlan foods. All their products we are pleased with. Vet recommended for large breed such as a Bernese Mountain Dog.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Duke Nukem loves this
customer_reviews.text: Pup loved it. We mix with his kibble so we can put his probiotics in there.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Washko

customer_reviews.title: Not the new formula shown
customer_reviews.text: The pictures showed the new formula and packaging but I received the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for keeping my dog well fed. I order all of our pets food, collars, and tick and worm medication. It is nice to know I never have to remember that I am low because it comes monthly. I buy litter for my cats and it is all so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Riley

customer_reviews.title: We have a large, but not extra-large dog who ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a large, but not extra-large dog who used to have stomach issues from swallowing his food. Using a food puzzle bowl works, but it's not always convenient when traveling. This giant breed formula with larger kibble has solved the problem! Now he takes his time and chews his food.
customer_reviews.author: Harold's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Hey Amazon...
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but Amazon the condition of these shipping boxes upon delivery makes me wonder if they were dropped from a plane. WTH?
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good Price High quality food
customer_reviews.text: Little less than other companies good quality dog food for your pet
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Van Leer

customer_reviews.title: Great and nutritious dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has eaten this since we got him. He is now 2 years old and it's the only food that he will eat. The only downfall is the cost.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyK

customer_reviews.title: Chuncks
customer_reviews.text: The bits are very large in comparison to standard dry dog food, kibble style.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy Bebop

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love Purina Pro Plan wet dog food.
customer_reviews.text: We use this with both our adult dogs and feel it meets their needs as adult dogs. Both dogs, a male Golden Retriever and a female Border Collie mix, are 8 years old this summer. We also feed them Purina dry Pro Plan in conjunction with the canned Pro Plan. We do this for variety as it seems to keep their interest up at feeding time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Janicki

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd/Malamute mix LOVES this food. It seems pretty good for them too, so no complaints. Also, you can order a huge bag, which is a huge plus for a gigantic dog!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many dog foods for my labradors over the last 20 years and have settled on Proplan. Quality ingredients that keep my dogs looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Young

customer_reviews.title: Purina Pro Plan Dog Food is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purina Pro Plan has such a wide variety of food for your pet. Prices and selection are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Great for our large Rhodesian
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our two Rhodesians and have been happy overall with the food.
customer_reviews.author: M&R's mommy

product_meta.title: Purina Pro Plan Large & Giant Breed Adult Dry Dog Food & Wet Dog Food
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:34 lb. BagTend to your dog's specific nutritional needs with Purina Pro Plan FOCUS Large Breed Formula adult dry dog food. Real chicken as the first ingredient of this large breed dog food helps provide protein, an essential nutritional building block within your dog's body. The highly-digestible formula promotes bioavailability, which means it's formulated to support optimal nutrient absorption. With 26% protein and 12% fat in every serving, this recipe helps to maintain his ideal weight and body condition. Every high-quality ingredient is carefully chosen for a specific nutritional or functional purpose, so your canine companion gets the wholesome goodness you expect from a trusted pet food brand in every delicious bowlful. Formulated for large breed, adult dogs weighing 50 pounds and up, this super-premium dry dog food offers 100% complete and balanced nutrition. You're as fond of your best friend as he is of you. Let the fondness grow with an order of Purina Pro Plan adult dry dog food.
feature_bullets: One (1) 34 lb. Bag - Purina Pro Plan High Protein Large Breed Dry Dog Food, FOCUS Large Breed Formula
Made with high-quality protein, including real chicken as the first ingredient
EPA, an omega-3 fatty acid, and glucosamine to help support joint health and mobility
Natural prebiotic fiber, sourced from wheat bran, helps promote digestive health
New Look and Name Coming Soon. May Receive Either Bag During Transition

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
